problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): During the game between the British team and the Iraqi team, play had to be stopped because a brawl had broke out within one set of fans. 8 fans were arrested for unruly behaviour, apparently some words were exchanged which got heated very quickly. The fans in question were all actually British and picked a fight between themselves in the heat of the moment.
Question: Which set of fans were not involved in the fight?
ans0: Not known
ans1: The Iraqi fans
ans2: The British fans
